# Data process

## HRS

### Wave 1

|-|-|-|-|-|-|
| **Label** |`History of diabetes mellitus`|`History of chronic pulmonary disorders`|`History of hypertension`|`History of arthritis, rheumatism or osteoarthritis`|`History of all Cardiovascular diseases`|
| **Table name** |`hrs_hrs_w1`|`hrs_hrs_w1`|`hrs_hrs_w1`|`hrs_hrs_w1`|`hrs_hrs_w1`|
| **Categories** |`0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes`|`0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes`|`0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes`|`0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes`|`0 = No`<br/>`1 = Yes`|
| **Missings** |`999 = Missing`|`999 = Missing`|`999 = Missing`|`999 = Missing`|`999 = Missing`|
| **Description** |  |  |  |  |  |

```{r assign hrs_w1, echo=FALSE}

opal.assign.table.tibble(o, 'HRS_hrs_w1','HRS_HD.hrs_hrs_w1',variables=list('h_diabetes','h_cpd','h_hypertension','h_joint_disorders','cvd_all'), missings = T)
HRS_hrs_w1 <- opal.execute(o,'HRS_hrs_w1')

```

```{r local hrs_w1, echo=FALSE}

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w1$h_diabetes
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = "h_diabetes")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
ggplot(HRS_hrs_w1, aes(x=factor(vbl))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(label(vbl)) + ylab("Frequency")

vbl <- HRS_hrs_w1$h_cpd
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = "h_cpd")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w1}

HRS_ds_hrs_w1 <- HRS_hrs_w1 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)

```

#### Statistics of the new harmonized variable

```{r descript hrs_w1, echo=F}

vbl <- HRS_ds_hrs_w1$multimorbid
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[3], caption = ds_label)
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[1], caption = "Category")
kable(Categorical_summary(vbl, missing_values = miss_values_vector)[2], caption = "Type of missing")
ggplot(HRS_ds_hrs_w1, aes(x=factor(vbl))) + geom_bar(stat="count", width=0.4, fill="steelblue") + xlab(ds_label) + ylab("Frequency")

```


#### Validation

```{r crosstabulation hrs_w1, echo=F}
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo hrs_w10}

HRS_ds_hrs_w10 <- HRS_hrs_w10 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ahead_w4}

HRS_ds_ahead_w4 <- HRS_ahead_w4 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)
```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ahead_w9}

HRS_ds_ahead_w9 <- HRS_ahead_w9 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo coda_w10}

HRS_ds_coda_w10 <- HRS_coda_w10 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo wb_w11}

HRS_ds_wb_w11 <- HRS_wb_w11 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%
  mutate_at(., vars(-id), ~replace(., list = which(. %in% 991:999), values = NA)) %>% 
  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)

```

#### Harmonisation algorithm

To compute `multimorbid` from the study-specific variables they have to be recoded as follows:

* `Multimorbid_score = sum(h_diabetes, h_cpd, h_hypertension, h_joint_disorders, cvd_all)`
* `Multimorbid_status = 1 if multimorbid_score > = 2`
* `Multimorbid_status = 0 if multimorbid_score < 2`
* `otherwise into 999`

**R script:**

```{r harmo ebb_w10}

HRS_ds_ebb_w10 <- HRS_ebb_w10 %>% 
  mutate(dead = purrr::pmap(mutate_at(., vars(-id), `==`, 996) %>% select(., -id), all) %>% unlist()) %>%

  mutate(multimorbid_score = rowSums(select(., -1, -dead), na.rm = T)) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = rowSums(!is.na(select(., -1, -dead, -multimorbid_score)))) %>%
  mutate(cardNA = cardNA/cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid_score = multimorbid_score * cardNA) %>%
  mutate(multimorbid = case_when(multimorbid_score >= 2 ~ 1, multimorbid_score < 2 ~ 0, dead ~ 996, TRUE ~ 999)) %>%
  select(id, multimorbid)
```

## Summary of descriptive statistics of the harmonised variable accross populations and waves

Two tables are generated: 

1. Percentages of categories in each harmonised variable.

2. Frequencies and percentages of individuals with different trajectories. To avoid too large table, Only trajectories with percentages larger than 0.3 are shown.


```{r helpfunctions, echo=F}

source("../../helpfunctions.r")

```






```{r summ, echo=F}

# All study waves and populations with abbreviated and descriptive names


hrw.hrw.cw <- list(hrs_w1 = c("hrs_w1","HRS w1"), hrs_w2 = c("hrs_w2","HRS w2"), hrs_w3 = c("hrs_w3","HRS w3"), hrs_w4 = c("hrs_w4","HRS w4"), hrs_w5 = c("hrs_w5","HRS w5"), hrs_w6 = c("hrs_w6","HRS w6"), hrs_w7 = c("hrs_w7","HRS w7"), hrs_w8 = c("hrs_w8","HRS w8"), hrs_w9 = c("hrs_w9","HRS w9"), hrs_w10 = c("hrs_w10","HRS w10"), hrs_w11 = c("hrs_w11","HRS w11"))

hrw.ahead.cw <- list(ahead_w2 = c("ahead_w2","AHEAD w2"), ahead_w3 = c("ahead_w3","AHEAD w3"), ahead_w4 = c("ahead_w4","AHEAD w4"), ahead_w5 = c("ahead_w5","AHEAD w5"), ahead_w6 = c("ahead_w6","AHEAD w6"), ahead_w7 = c("ahead_w7","AHEAD w7"), ahead_w8 = c("ahead_w8","AHEAD w8"), ahead_w9 = c("ahead_w9","AHEAD w9"), ahead_w10 = c("ahead_w10","AHEAD w10"), ahead_w11 = c("ahead_w11","AHEAD w11"))

hrw.coda.cw <- list(coda_w4 = c("coda_w4","CODA w4"), coda_w5 = c("coda_w5","CODA w5"), coda_w6 = c("coda_w6","CODA w6"), coda_w7 = c("coda_w7","CODA w7"), coda_w8 = c("coda_w8","CODA w8"), coda_w9 = c("coda_w9","CODA w9"), coda_w10 = c("coda_w10","CODA w10"), coda_w11 = c("coda_w11","CODA w11"))

hrw.wb.cw <- list(wb_w4 = c("wb_w4","WB w4"), wb_w5 = c("wb_w5","WB w5"), wb_w6 = c("wb_w6","WB w6"), wb_w7 = c("wb_w7","WB w7"), wb_w8 = c("wb_w8","WB w8"), wb_w9 = c("wb_w9","WB w9"), wb_w10 = c("wb_w10","WB w10"), wb_w11 = c("wb_w11","WB w11"))

hrw.ebb.cw <- list(ebb_w7 = c("ebb_w7","EBB w7"), ebb_w8 = c("ebb_w8","EBB w8"), ebb_w9 = c("ebb_w9","EBB w9"), ebb_w10 = c("ebb_w10","EBB w10"), ebb_w11 = c("ebb_w11","EBB w11"))

hrw.mbb.cw <- list(mbb_w10 = c("mbb_w10","MBB w10"), mbb_w11 = c("mbb_w11","MBB w11"))



# HRS

# Consider only harmonised waves
l.hds <- lapply(hrw.hrw.cw, function(wname) if(exists(paste0("HRS_ds_",wname[1]))){wname = list(get(paste0("HRS_ds_",wname[1])),wname[2])})
nullw <- which(sapply(l.hds, is.null))

if(length(nullw)!=0){
  l.hds <- l.hds[-nullw]
}

m.hds <- list()

lmlist <- list(lapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[1]]),m.hds)

if(length(l.hds)>0){
  # Labelling tibbles
  lmlist <- labelling(lmlist[[1]],lmlist[[2]])
  # Printing table of categories
  print(knitr::kable(summaries(lmlist[[1]],lmlist[[2]],lapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[2]])),caption=ds_label))
  # Printing table of trajectories
  f.dbb <- trajectories(lmlist[[2]],vbl_name=hd_vbl)
  print(knitr::kable(f.dbb[f.dbb[,3]>=0.3,]))
  # Saving tibbles
  savingRD(lmlist[[1]],vbl_name=hd_vbl)
}

}

m.hds <- list()

lmlist <- list(lapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[1]]),m.hds)

if(length(l.hds)>0){
  # Labelling tibbles
  lmlist <- labelling(lmlist[[1]],lmlist[[2]])
  # Printing table of categories
  print(knitr::kable(summaries(lmlist[[1]],lmlist[[2]],lapply(l.hds,function(x)x[[2]])),caption=ds_label))
  # Printing table of trajectories
  f.dbb <- trajectories(lmlist[[2]],vbl_name=hd_vbl)
  print(knitr::kable(f.dbb[f.dbb[,3]>=0.3,]))
  # Saving tibbles
  savingRD(lmlist[[1]],vbl_name=hd_vbl)
}
```
